Description:
QUALITY AND LUXURY..WITHIN YOUR BUDGET!
CRANBOURNE: Grove Estate: This magnificent house is perfect for a perfect family, just like yours! Location wise, it's conveniently close to all the amenities, while being on a quite street for the peace of mind you so deserve!
This fascinating 4 bedroom house is complete with 2 separate living areas. The master bedroom with full ensuite and walk in Robes!
The other 3 bedrooms have plenty of room and their own built in robes.
The kitchen is so beautifully laid out that you wouldn't mind spending your free moments there! Compete with quality range hood, gas cook top, plenty of bench top space and pantry storage.
Features of the property:
4 bedrooms, Master with ensuite and WIR
2 Separate Living Areas
Gourmet kitchen with Stainless Steel Appliances
Heating and Cooling
Tiles & Carpet
Downlights
Remote Roller Door to Car Garage
Established Front and Back Garden
Age of property: 6 years approx.
Land size: 420s sqm approx.
Heating: Yes
Cooling: Yes
Chattels: All fittings and fixtures as inspected.
Deposit terms: 10% of the purchase price.
Preferred Settlement: 30/45 days.
Walking and Short drive facilities: Cranbourne Home maker Centre, Hunt Club Shopping centre, Carlisle Park Primary School, Childcare/ kindergarten, Carlisle Viking Sporting facility, Cranbourne / Merinda park Train station
This one won't last long in the market, call Hardeep Singh now and make it yours, before someone else does! PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN HOMES.
Every care has been taken to verify the accuracy of the details in this advertisement, however we cannot guarantee its correctness. Prospective purchasers are requested to take such action as is necessary, to satisfy themselves of any pertinent matters.

Description:
GREAT LOCATION! GREAT OPPORTUNITY!
(218100) This home is perfect for those who wish to downsize but don't want to compromise lifestyle. With compact low maintenance gardens, this beautiful home offers quality and style throughout.
The renovated 3 bedroom family home on a easy to maintain 371m2 Approx. block will appeal to families, investors and downsizers alike with nothing to do other than move in and enjoy. Features include three spacious bedrooms, central family bathroom plus separate laundry facilities, modern kitchen with S/S appliances, GWH, A/C plus good size lounge/living.
Outside offers private courtyard with pergola, also a new double lock up garage with rear access to yard. Potential you could create a gorgeous courtyard in the front yard around a beautiful oak tree. Located within walking distance to shopping centre, schools & public transport, this home is sure to impress.
Don't miss out on this one!! For all enquires call John Lauretta.
Be quick to book your Appointment.

Description:
**** Under Offer **** Perfect for Starters or Investors
This 12 years young and modern brick veneer double story home situated in a quiet and friendly street and has outstanding value for money, property in this highly sought-after location don't last long! Some key features on offer include:
- Three Bedrooms
- Master with ensuite, Walk-in robe & balcony.
- Generous size living room
- Separate dining area
- Spacious kitchen with overhead cupboards and stainless-steel appliances
- Gas ducted heating
- Evaporative cooling
- Double lock up garage with internal access
- High ceilings with incredible natural light.
- Powder room on ground floor
- Great sized backyard
This home offers remarkable value and its location is supreme with its easy walk to Springhill shops, Carlisle Park kindergarten, Carlisle Primary School plus Casey Central just a short drive away! Investors or first home buyers this home will be sure to impress, and your inspection is highly recommended!
** Investors: Did you know Harcourts Narre Warren South are one of the largest rental management agencies in the South East? Our department head of rentals Melanie Keating has appraised this property at $360-$370 p/w ($1560- $1603 pcm) for more details about leasing contact Melanie on 03 9705 3000 today.

Description:
A golden opportunity
This home is as neat as a pin and has been kept in immaculate condition. Situated on a large 669 sqm block close to all amenities, there is loads of potential to rent or renovate. Comprising:
- Three bedrooms with built-in robes
- Large lounge with gas log fire
- Open plan kitchen / meals /dining area with split system
- Double lock-up garage with rear roller door access
- Easy to maintain rear garden with 2 sheds and fruit trees
- Electric security shutters at the front of the property
This is a much sought after location being walking distance to Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, schools, kindergartens, day care and public transport including a bus just outside your door!

Description:
Over 2000sqm in a quiet court location
This is your chance to purchase this lovely property in a quiet pocket of Cranbourne. In a fantastic location, close to all amenities with room for the whole family, the caravan, the boat and motorbikes too. With over 2000 sqm of land with beautifully landscaped gardens and established trees. Features of this home include:
- Three spacious bedrooms with built in robes. The master with a walk-in robe and full ensuite.
- A family sized kitchen with a wall oven, hot plates, dishwasher and loads of bench space and storage. This is the perfect environment for anyone who loves to create amazing dishes for their family & friends.
- Three large living areas, a family room overlooking the kitchen, a living room & separate dining with a wood fire heater and for those cosy winter nights. Then there is a large living room that would make a great games room with enough space to fit any size pool table.
- There is a great sized study that could be used for the kids, as a home or office or even a craft room.
- There is a huge paved pergola that wraps around three sides of the home. Overlooking the landscaped gardens and with a built in BBQ and pizza oven this is the perfect entertaining space.
- There is storage space everywhere on this property. A double garage under roof line, a four-car carport and a 11 x 7m shed (approx.) with a high clearance roller door located at the rear of the property. You have access to the yard from both sides of the home as well as street access from the rear of the block. You will never have an issue getting something large into this yard.
- Fully landscaped yard with a dry creek, foot bridge and a small gazebo with seating overlooking the built-in playground. There are also a number of fruit trees, vegie garden and a potting shed.
Some of the other features of this home include ducted heating, evaporative cooling & ceiling fans. This home has everything you could want for your family as well as room to store anything your heart desires. Call us today to book your appointment to inspect your new home.

Description:
SUPERB DEVELOPMENT SITE (981m2 Approx.)
(218058)
*
981m2 approx. consisting of one separate title with dwelling.
*
Development Site (STCA)
*
Situated in one of Melbourne's fastest expanding growth corridors.
Conveniently located in the heart of Cranbourne only a short walk from the major shopping centre, High Street, Medical facilities, several schools & public transport.
The property itself consists of 3 decent sized bedrooms, a spacious living areas, large kitchen, family bathroom plus room for a second bathroom, huge laundry,
gas ducted heating, AC, landscaped gardens, 2x3000ltr water tanks.
It's just perfect if you are looking for some returns while you are waiting.
The central area of Cranbourne is one of the most established and sought after areas. Located within walking distance to all facilities, including Cranbourne Centro, a range of restaurants, Cranbourne Secondary College and Cranbourne Station. Cranbourne Central provides the perfect combination for any resident.

Description:
Put Me On The Top Of Your List ....!
This amazingly beautiful home has 3 good size bedrooms, including the master with a walk through wardrobe and a full en-suite. The family bathroom has a separate toilet and well sized Laundry. Ceiling fan in master room provides extra comfort. Well-designed floor plan which provides two separate cosy living area's with the comfort of air conditioner and a ceiling fan. The super clean kitchen has stainless steel appliances with gas cook top, well maintained bench top along with a dishwasher. Ducted heating and down lights throughout house provides comfort and elegance to this beautiful home. This property also includes a single lock up garage which can be accessed by a remote control. Outside is the dream area for every family member. Side access and Back yard with extensive concreting and don't forget the covered alfresco area with decking and plenty of seating arrangements. Perfect for year round entertainment there is plenty of space should you wish to extend with decking area.
Overall it's a super low maintenance well taken care of property that has to be on the top of your List. This well positioned property is close to parklands together with the recently constructed amenities in the Hunt Club Shopping Village and those along Thompsons Road. Casey Fields & Casey Race - Sports and recreation facilities, train stations and other forms of public transport are all close by, whilst there is also easy access to medical centres, kindergartens, fitness centres, child care centres, and school's both primary and secondary with freeway access! Hurry up and contact us this beauty won't last long..!

Description:
Neat family home with a great outlook!
This family-friendly home is sure to tick all the right boxes with multiple living zones, outdoor entertaining and in a great location to match. The property would be well suited to everyone families, first home buyers, investors you name it come and have a look for your self's.
Comprising of 4bedrooms all with built in robes, master has a walk in robe and ensuite, independent lounge room, open plan kitchen meals and living, central bathroom and separate laundry. Also featuring ducted heating and 2 split systems to keep you comfortable all year round.
Outdoors has a great size undercover entertainment area perfect for a BBQ for when the family or friends come to visit; there is space to have a trailer or a small car to fit as there is through access from the double car garage.
Across the street, there is a pergola and park perfect for the whole family, while remaining a short walk or drive to the Hunt Club Shopping center, schools, and day-care facilities.
Contact Jason Stirling for more information 0411 520 173

Description:
** UNDER CONTRACT **
CRANBOURNE - And.....did I mention the whopping 895sqm block of land? This one's got the lot! If you've been looking for land lots of land, a comfortable and renovated home with added features, you won't go past this true 'Entertainer's Delight' including a massive undercover outdoor alfresco complete with built-in brick fireplace that could be converted to an outdoor bbq, centrally located and so close to all local amenities. The key feature of this fabulous property is the massive 895sqm block of land which is sure to attract those who need room to move or inclined to update or develop. With a welcoming and cosy 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom home, you won't believe your eyes as you wander through this neat as a pin renovated family home perfect for the tradie to store all your goodies, the astute investor looking for an instant return on investment or the keen first home buyer looking for a place to call their own home! Comprising three bedrooms, two with BIR's, updated family bathroom with separate toilet and separate laundry, open plan kitchen/meals and formal lounge with an enclosed wood fireplace. Modern lighting, soft grey neutral tones, tiled wet areas and timber floating floorboards throughout. Outside is a lock up garage with a workshop space that could accommodate up to four cars. You'll love relaxing in the inviting alfresco area and enjoy entertaining family and friends at those special times of the year. The property sits in the bowl of a court and backs onto parkland and is only a few minutes walk to Rangebank Primary School, also close by are local strip shopping, public transport and easy access to Westernport Hwy, Eastlink and Peninsula Link. Casey Race and Casey Fields sporting complex are a few minutes drive, as is Thompson Parkway Shopping Centre, Cranbourne Homemaker Centre and Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre. Nearby also are medical and dental clinics, local primary and secondary schools and Chisholm TAFE. It doesn't get any more central that this top property in a top location, it really does tick all the boxes!
CRANBOURNE CENTRAL:
The central area of Cranbourne is one of the most established and sought after areas. With a mix of older homes on larger blocks and units. Located within walking distance to all facilities, including the newly renovated Cranbourne Park, a range of restaurants, Cranbourne Secondary College and Cranbourne Train Station. Cranbourne Central provides the perfect combination for any resident.
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN HOMES.
**Please Note - Open for Inspections are subject to change or cancellation without prior notice**
Other features of this lovely home are:
* Updated Kitchen/meals with dishwasher
* Updated bathroom/toilet/laundry
* Security alarm system
* Ducted heating
* Ducted evaporative cooling
* Huge 895sqm block
* NBN connected
* Quality drapes/curtains
* Downlights
* Quality light fittings
* Near new floating floorboards
* Up to four car garage plus plenty of off street parking
* Close to all local amenities
* Close to primary and secondary schools
* Easy access to Westernport Hwy, Eastlink & Peninsula Link

Description:
Street Front Villa - 3 Beds plus 2 bathrooms!
Young, modern and spacious living is offered throughout in this stylish 3 bedroom villa in the heart of Cranbourne. Offering direct street frontage, instant modern appeal and enough space for the whole family; easy living is enjoyed with low maintenance benefits.
As you enter the spacious villa, you have immediate modern appeal with a wide entrance hall leading to large family living area with ducted heating and split system air conditioning. The kitchen presents large open area with breakfast bar and adjoining meals area with sliding doors to outdoor entertaining courtyard.
3 generous size bedrooms with robes and full ensuite bathroom to main bedroom. Separate family bathroom with bath and shower, well positioned near the other two bedrooms plus separate toilet.
Outdoors, you're greeted with easy to maintain garden surrounds, closed off outdoor entertaining area with single lock up garage with internal access. Central and convenient, this popular location is in close proximity to Cranbourne Park Primary School, Cranbourne Secondary College, Clarendon Street Reserve and Cranbourne Park shopping centre.

Description:
**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
BROOKLAND GREENS ESTATE, CRANBOURNE: Brilliant in design, plenty of space both inside and out plus an A1 location close to all amenities ..... what more could you ask for!? This quality built home amasses to over 30 squares and is nicely positioned on a large block of around 660m2. Located in a very well-established estate in close proximity to child care facilities and major arterials this is a certain addition to your inspection list!
Upon entry you will be greeted by a multiple of living options including a vast formal lounge/dining room, an open plan family area plus an adjoining rumpus that can easily double up as the perfect home theatre. The large galley style kitchen is complete with stainless appliances and a separate meals zone.
There are 4 genuine robed bedrooms, including the master with a walk-in wardrobe and an impressive ensuite, plus a host of additional features including a lovely family bathroom, ducted heating and evaporative cooling for seasonal comfort.
Outside you find a double garage with remote door and internal access plus a huge backyard that is highlighted by a massive entertainment area with extensive decking. This has to be one of the main selling features making 4 Ferndown Drive the place to be for Summer time get-togethers with family and friends!
Sensationally located in one of Cranbourne's most prestigious estates this grand opportunity is surrounded by quality established homes. With the Ranfurlie, Greg Norman and Amstel golf courses all close by, Brookland Greens also features open parkland with a BMX track, exercise stations, walking tracks, playgrounds and sporting facilities. Local schools and shops are only minutes away!

Description:
OPPORTUNITY FOR THOSE FOCUSED ON LOCATION!
CRANBOURNE CENTRAL: A Great home in a central location, makes this property a very appealing proposition! Set on a large block of 604m2 approx. Potential for subdivision (S.T.C.A) nestled in a blue-chip location surrounded by all the town centre's local amenities, A moments stroll to Lurline Street shops & with Cranbourne Park Shopping centre only a brisk walk away allowing you easy access to an array of shopping outlets and cafes/restaurants.
This charming home, In the heart of Cranbourne, consists of a warm neutral colour and hard wood timber floorboards, that makes you feel instantly at home. With 3 great size bedrooms, all are in close proximity to the family bathroom with separate bath and shower facilities.
Separate kitchen with plenty of cupboard space with adjoining meals area overlooking the rear yard. A generous lounge room, with the cooler nights this winter it's the perfect place to keep warm and enjoy a night in.
Fantastic size backyard, the ideal place to entertain friends and family or to unwind and relax after a hard day's work. secure off-road parking with a fenced front yard, and so much more.
If you believe in the age-old theory that good real estate revolves around a central location, then you won't be disappointed!
The central area of Cranbourne is one of the most established and sought-after areas. With a mix of older homes on larger blocks and units. Located within walking distance to all facilities, including the newly renovated Cranbourne Centro, a range of restaurants, Cranbourne Secondary College and Cranbourne Train Station. Cranbourne Central provides the perfect combination for any resident.
At Ray White Cranbourne our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and the vendor's expectations. You can view with confidence that the vendors will sell within the range with favourable conditions.

Description:
Best Value in Town!
In the heart of Cranbourne we have this amazing value for money 2 bedroom unit. Perfect for the entry level investor or those looking to add to their existing portfolio. Currently leased to a long-term tenant of the past 7 years who calls it home, you won't find anything better! Some features on offer include:
- Two Bedrooms
- Built-in robes to both
- Large lounge room
- Separate meals area
- Gas heating
- Wall split system cooling unit
- Single garage
- Large rear courtyard
Being the front unit in this tidy complex and with the visitor parking space adjacent, you have an undeniable sense of space around you. With just a short walk to the main Cranbourne Shopping hub and public transport just minutes away make this property something to hold onto for years to come. At this price range it won't last long - make sure you register your details for our upcoming inspection and to secure your section 32 / vendors statement to make your relevant due diligence to avoid disappointment.
** Investors: Did you know Harcourts Narre Warren South are one of the largest rental management agencies in the South East? Our Business Development Associate has appraised this property at $260 - $270 p/w ($1130-$1173pcm) for more details about leasing contact Harcourts on 9705 3000 today.

Description:
SPACIOUS AND SECURE LOW MAINTENANCE LIVING
Itâ??s refreshing to offer a property that has something for everyone.
Perfectly positioned on a large 720 SQM allotment that is within minutes of Cranbourne Train station, schools, shopping centres, public transport and sporting facilities is this well cared for and beautifully presented family home. Boasting 4 bedrooms the master with en suite, spacious formal lounge, open plan living with fully functional kitchen with an abundance of storage/cupboard space, renovated bathroom and fitted laundry. Externally the property features an oversized double carport ideal for housing 4 wheel drives, boats, caravans and horse floats as well providing access to the extensively concreted parking area and the huge lock up garage. Also featured is a covered outdoor entertaining area which overlooks the lovely landscaped gardens and provides for year round entertaining.
Further inclusions of note: polished timber floors, split air conditioning, heating & Led down lights.
There is also enough space for possible separate dwelling (STCA)
Just stop looking and inspect this property now. Call Vikram on 0430392918 or Ajay 0403351577 for more information.
